pr_title: [BEAM-10492] Add missing sideinput handling to DLP transforms

timeline.message: [BEAM-10492] Add missing sideinput handling to DLP transforms

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to add new unit tests to cover the new functionality ?
timeline.author: chamikaramj

replies.bodyText: It would be nice to add them, but I have no idea how to approach checking this. Do you have any suggestions?
replies.author: mwalenia

replies.bodyText:
I'm not sure of all the available tools for testing DoFns in Beam so there may be better options but one way would be to use the @NeedsRunner annotation and some PAsserts to verify the expected output (from the wiki)?
It would require injecting a mock cloud client library to avoid making any calls to the live API.
replies.author: tysonjh

replies.bodyText: It was just a suggestion. I'm OK with merging as it is if that's OK with the author of the PR.
replies.author: chamikaramj

replies.bodyText: Thanks, merging for now so that we don't have to cherry-pick this into 2.24.0 and we have manually verified the fix on 2.23.0.
replies.author: tvalentyn
